summary: This is a daily assignment roster for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, NY, dated Friday, August 9, 2019. It details staff posts, shifts, and leave statuses (sick, annual, AWOL) for correctional officers and other personnel. The document is significant as it provides a snapshot of staffing at the federal jail where Jeffrey Epstein was held prior to his death.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The document is a staff roster for the MCC New York, the facility where Jeffrey Epstein was incarcerated. His inmate status is the implicit context for the roster's creation and security designations.

connections.description: KS was part of the supervisory staff at the MCC facility responsible for inmate security and staff assignments where Epstein was held.
RW was part of the supervisory staff at the MCC facility responsible for inmate security and staff assignments where Epstein was held.
Both are supervisors (identified by initials) making entries on the same MCC staff assignment roster, indicating they are colleagues within the correctional facility administration.

events.title: MCC Staff Roster Creation
events.description: The daily assignment roster for the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, is generated, detailing staff posts, shifts, and leave statuses.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC), New York, NY
keyFacts: This document is a staff assignment roster for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, dated August 9, 2019, the facility where Jeffrey Epstein was incarcerated.
The roster details specific posts and security assignments including the SHU (Special Housing Unit), ATTY CONF (Attorney Conference), DRY CELL, and EPO OFFICE.
It shows numerous staff status changes for sick leave, annual leave, AWOL, and LWOP (Leave Without Pay) in the days leading up to and including August 9, 2019.
The document records overtime occurrences (29) and compliance occurrences (0) for the facility on that date.
Supervisory staff are identified by initials (KS, RW, JD, DM, CP, MC, SJ, TD) who made changes to the roster.
